title: Camouflage font?
content:
Does anyone know a good camouflage style font?

 [‹ (x) Danish Wind Industry - Foundry Gridnik {Karl}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080411232744/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6679 "Go to previous forum topic") [Free fonts killing the font vendors... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080411232744/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6661 "Go to next forum topic")
author: anonymous

comments.content: No, more like a font which has a camouflage pattern.
Not sure what you mean... if fonts have patterns they're usually applied manually.
